en: We went to the Tama Zoo.
zh: 我们去了多摩动物园。

en: We are faced with a host of problems.
zh: 我们面临着许多问题。

en: We use a lot of water.
zh: 我们用水很多。

en: We asked many persons about the new store, but no one had heard of it.
zh: 我们向很多人询问了这家新店，但没人听说过。

en: We encountered many difficulties.
zh: 我们遇到了许多困难。

en: We held many negotiations but to no purpose.
zh: 我们进行了多次谈判，但毫无用处。

en: We are more or less selfish.
zh: 我们或多或少都是自私的。

en: We were more or less disappointed about the election.
zh: 我们对这次选举或多或少感到失望。

en: We should respect the rights of others, much more their lives.
zh: 我们应该尊重他人的权利，更应该尊重他人的生命。

en: We should respect the right of others.
zh: 我们应该尊重他人的权利。

en: We should respect the basic human rights of others much more their lives.
zh: 我们应该尊重他人基本的人权，更应该尊重他人的生命。

en: We must try to be kind to other people.
zh: 我们必须努力善待他人。

en: We must pay regard to other cultures like ours.
zh: 我们必须尊重其他与我们类似的文化。

en: We got a hostile reception from the villagers.
zh: 我们受到了村民们的敌对接待。

en: We watched the game while holding our breath.
zh: 我们屏住呼吸观看了比赛。

en: We made statues out of wood.
zh: 我们用木头制作雕像。

en: We lay on the grass.
zh: 我们躺在草地上。

en: We got up early and set about cleaning our house.
zh: 我们早早起床，开始打扫我们的房子。

en: We must leave early.
zh: 我们必须早点离开。

en: We have to fix the date for our trip quickly.
zh: 我们必须尽快确定旅行的日期。
